Your challenge is to create an aircraft and try to get as far a distance as possible. But wait! there\'s more. You will also try to 'Carry passengers' using the structural fuselage.

Rules- Plane must be stock, one stage (no boosters), must stay in atmosphere, Must take off from runway (just no vertical rockets)

scoring- Scoring is simple. Distance over ground x Passengers carried (for one structural Fuselage = 1 Passenger)

extra points---

rockets only = 500

below 8,000 meters = 1000

successful landing = 1500

Good luck

Leader board---

I do feel the first two items on the \'extra points\' are a bit redundant. Using rockets only seems a slight bit selective, and doesn\'t really balance out the fact that rocket engines won\'t equal the efficiency of turbojets, and the \'above 10 000m\' is almost a must to maximise distance. It\'s not that hard to achieve.
The bonus should be \'below a certain altitude\' since aircraft are a lot less efficient lower down, as the drag greatly reduces speed.
